about_the_game:
These new FRS3 "Ride Pack" includes three of the most awesome fairground thrillrides:

1) Flying Swing
A huge chairoplane.

2) Propeller
A giant ride with one huge arm attached with two gondolas.

3) Gambler
This one is a classic - a giant rotating plate with reverse spining crosses and fast-flicking gondolas.

Each ride can be fully controlled (engines, lights). Take a seat in one of your new rides and enjoy together with your virtual visitors the ride!
